alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Iberia and central St. Martin Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Butte La Rose, or near Catahoula, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Catahoula, Loreauville and Butte La Rose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
